awd_titl_txt: Support of Student Attendance at a Conference: Third Meetingof The Society for Research on Biological Rhythms: May 6-10,1992: Amelia Island, FL
awd_abstract_narration: This award is being given to support student attendance at the                  Third Meeting of the Society for Research on Biological Rhythms to              be held in May 1992. The three-day meeting will include a plenary               lecture, symposia, workshops, slides presentations and poster                   presentations. Attendance will allow students to interact with                  senior researchers in the field. This type of interaction is an                 important aspect of training of young scientists. Knowledge of                  biological rhythms is critical to understanding diurnal rhythms of              hormones and brain transmitters in humans as well as seasonal                   cyclicity in other animal species.

inst.inst_name: Society for Research on Biologicl Rhythms
